schemas.CSAS_OUTPUT_0.KsqlTopic.Source: STRUCT<F0 INT, F1 BIGINT, F2 DOUBLE, F3 BOOLEAN, F4 VARCHAR, F5 DECIMAL(20, 10), F6 STRUCT<A VARCHAR>> NOT NULL
schemas.CSAS_OUTPUT_0.OUTPUT: STRUCT<KSQL_COL_0 INT, KSQL_COL_1 BIGINT, KSQL_COL_2 DOUBLE, KSQL_COL_3 BOOLEAN, KSQL_COL_4 VARCHAR, KSQL_COL_5 DECIMAL(30, 10), KSQL_COL_6 STRUCT<A VARCHAR>> NOT NULL

testCase.name: test_udtf - return vals
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (F0 INTEGER, F1 BIGINT, F2 DOUBLE, F3 BOOLEAN, F4 STRING, F5 DECIMAL(20, 10), F6 STRUCT<A STRING>) WITH (KAFKA_TOPIC='test_topic', VALUE_FORMAT='JSON');

CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT
  TEST_UDTF(TEST.F0) KSQL_COL_0,
  TEST_UDTF(TEST.F1) KSQL_COL_1,
  TEST_UDTF(TEST.F2) KSQL_COL_2,
  TEST_UDTF(TEST.F3) KSQL_COL_3,
  TEST_UDTF(TEST.F4) KSQL_COL_4,
  TEST_UDTF(TEST.F5) KSQL_COL_5,
  TEST_UDTF(TEST.F6) KSQL_COL_6
FROM TEST TEST
EMIT CHANGES;
